long_description: The low-profile, high-style Anon Hawkeye Premium snow goggles feature a large, spherical lens paired with a flexible, comfortable frame to ensure you look, feel and see great on bright, sunny days. Dark Smoke lens has a dark gray tint with 8% visible light transmission to maintain color definition and reduce eye strain on super-bright days. Spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Antifog treatment and full-perimeter venting combat lens fogging. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Low-profile and tough thermoplastic polyurethane frame offers consistent flexibility in changing temperatures for a comfortable, secure fit. Strap outriggers hinge to create a flush fit that minimizes gaps and distributes pressure evenly across your face. The helmet-compatible design fits medium-size faces; goggles come with a microfiber storage bag. As part of the Anon Premium series, the Hawkeye Premium snow goggles feature the latest in high-resolution graphics and detailed frame and strap finishes.
short_description: The low-profile, high-style Anon Hawkeye Premium snow goggles feature a large, spherical lens paired with a flexible, comfortable frame to ensure you look, feel and see great on bright, sunny days.
